document.full_text: social-networking sites such as facebook, or search engines such as google, may face court action if they fail to obey planned eu data privacy rules, european union justice chief viviane reding said on wednesday.
document.title: eu wants facebook, google to comply with new data rules
lines_and_colors: social-networking sites such as facebook, or search engines such as google, may face court action if they fail to obey planned eu data privacy rules, european union justice chief viviane reding said on wednesday.
